Parser

Class Token

  • java.lang.Object
    • Parser.Token

  • public class Token
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines the possible tokens in the TM simulator language. Provides regular expression matching to verify lexemes are a given token.

    • Method Detail

      • lexemeMatches

        public static boolean lexemeMatches(int token,
                                    java.lang.String lexeme)
        Tests whether the lexeme matches the expected token.
        Parameters:
        token - category the lexeme is expected to belong to (STATE, SYMBOL, DIRECTION, etc)
        lexeme - the lexeme to verify
        Returns:
        true if the lexeme is in the token category, otherwise false
